/>
VI.ii.4.A.3.j
.
Notifying Insurance Service After Denying a Veteran’s Claim Because They Elected to Receive MRP
After denying a Veteran’s claim because they elected to receive MRP instead of disability compensation, notify Insurance Service.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Elections and Waivers in Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
